actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to continue for a 3-year period the suspension of the duties on dicyclomine hydrochloride, mepenzolate bromide, desipramine hydrochloride, rifampin, terfenadine, clomiphene citrate, and lactulose.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to continue through December 31, 1990, the suspension of duties on dicyclomine hydrochloride, mepenzolate bromide, desipramine hydrochloride, rifampin, terfenadine, clomiphene citrate, and lactulose.

titles.title: A bill to continue for a 3-year period the suspension of the duties on dicyclomine hydrochloride, mepenzolate bromide, desipramine hydrochloride, rifampin, terfenadine, clomiphene citrate, and lactulose.
